attributes.action: Take the United Kingdom out of the EU.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Leave the EU restore UK parliamnentary democracy.  Introduce latter.
Ensure no financial or other penalties
ensue.
Scrap all EU imposed laws, rules and regulations.  Maintain adequate defence capability.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
